content: मत्स्यः [मद्-स्यनः <ls>Uṇ. 4. 2.</ls>] {@--1@} A fish; शूले मत्स्यानिवापक्ष्यन् दबलोन्व लवत्तराः <ls>Ms. 7. 20.</ls> {@--2@} A particular variety of fish. {@--3@} A king of the Matsyas. --त्स्यौ (dual) The sign {%Pisces%} of the zodiac. --त्स्याः (<ab>pl.</ab>) <ab>N.</ab> of a country and its inhabitants. the country of Virāṭa <ab>q. v.</ab>; <ls>Ms. 2. 19.</ls>

मत्स्य or विराट <ab>N.</ab> of a country lying to the west of Dholpur; the Pāṇḍavas are said to have entered it from the banks of the Yamunā through the land of the Rohitakas and Sūrasenas towards the north of Daśārṇa. Vairāṭa, the capital of Virāṭa, is probably the same as Bairat 40 miles north of Jeypore.
